Class Neighbour

  • java.lang.Object
    • Neighbour

  • public class Neighbour
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used in pathfinding by the Node class. Each Node object contains an array of Neighbours that contain both the specific neighbouring Node and the distance between the two Nodes.
    Since:
    December 10th, 2012
    Author:
    Bobby Meagher
